description: This model shows a facility mechanical room with lots of pipes and stuff.

sensors.name: Boiler Heating Temperature
sensors.description: Calibratable room temperature measuring transducer with Modbus connection, in an impact-resistant plastic housing. Designed for higher temperatures.

sensors.name: Drinking Water Temperature Boiler
sensors.description: This Drinking Water Temperature Sensor is a probe that measures water temperature from -40° to +70°C. It consists of a thermistor encased in a sheath made from grade 316L stainless steel.

sensors.name: Drinking Water Temperature House Supply
sensors.description: This Drinking Water Temperature Sensor is a probe that measures water temperature from -40° to +70°C. It consists of a thermistor encased in a sheath made from grade 316L stainless steel.

sensors.name: Flow Temperature
sensors.description: Inline Flow-Through Temperature Sensor monitors the temperature of a fluid that passes through it where a system control module receives this temperature reading and uses a control loop to control the overall system temperature.

sensors.name: Outdoor Temperature
sensors.description: This Outdoor Temperature Sensor is a narrow-band, long range, low power consumption, high performance and high quality wireless sensor transmitting temperature from a NTC probe.

sensors.name: Pressure
sensors.description: Pressure Sensor for water pipe pressure measurement at water distribution utilities.

sensors.name: Return Flow Temperature
sensors.description: Inline Return Flow Temperature Sensor monitors the temperature of a fluid that passes through it. The output values are related to the Thermal Flow Sensor.
